Hello,

I’m Enrico, co-founder of Wami. Let me introduce myself and my company - I’ll be quick, I promise.

Wami is a tech startup working in the travel industry with mobile travel guides (to know more about us: www.wami.it).

The maps we use inside our applications are built from OSM data: they’re super cool vectorial maps that are among the lightest ones on the market and can be used offline, as well.

But we didn’t stop here: while we were working on Open Street Map data, we’ve created awesome data sets featuring reworked and optimized data in JSON and geoJSON format.

… which brings us to the point of my e-mail: we’ve recently released a project called Wami Map http://map.wami.it - now our APIs are open to all developers wishing to create geolocalized application in a fast and easy way.

Why don’t you take a look and let me know your opinion about it? I do believe we can give life to amazing projects, so fork us on GitHub and help Wami Map grow and improve!

For further enquires, let’s keep in touch.
